directions: Combine hot pepper sauce, butter, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, cayenne pepper, garlic powder, black pepper, red pepper flakes, and flour in a small saucepan over low heat; cook and stir, adding more flour if needed to thicken, until smooth, 5 to 10 minutes.
ingredients: 3/4 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot®)
1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon all-purpose flour, or as needed
title: JB Buffalo Wing Sauce
